abstract: If you have no idea what kind of graphics card is under the hood of your computer — PC or Mac — there is an easy way to find out.
snippet: If you have no idea what kind of graphics card is under the hood of your computer — PC or Mac — there is an easy way to find out.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have no idea what kind of graphics card my computer has inside, or the amount of memory it has. Is there a quick way to find out?

headline.main: Checking the Graphics Card Specifications on Your Computer
